description: Detects a successful export of an Exchange mailbox to untypical directory or with aspx name suffix which can be used to place a webshell or the needed role assignment for it Author: Florian Roth, Rich Warren, Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Mailbox Export to Exchange Webserver
query: (((*New\-MailboxExportRequest* AND *\ \-Mailbox\ *) AND (*\-FilePath\ \"\\\\localhost\\C$* OR *\-FilePath\ \"\\\\127.0.0.1\\C$* OR *.aspx*)) OR (*New\-ManagementRoleAssignment* AND *\ \-Role\ \"Mailbox\ Import\ Export\"* AND *\ \-User\ *))
